Package io.micronaut.http.server.netty.body

Class SystemFileBodyWriter

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.http.server.netty.body.SystemFileBodyWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageBodyWriter<SystemFile>, ResponseBodyWriter<SystemFile>
@Singleton @Internal public final class SystemFileBodyWriter extends Object implements ResponseBodyWriter<SystemFile>
Body writer for SystemFiles.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
